\section{Research Experience}

\cventry{Fall 2016 - Present}{Undergraduate Research Assistant}{Department of Computer Science}{Texas A\&M University}{}{
    \begin{itemize}
        \item Research parametrized algorithms for hard problems.
        \item Research faster algorithm for the Line-Cover Problem.
    \end{itemize}
}
\cventry{Summer 2016}{Undergraduate Research Assistant}{Department of Mathematics}{Texas A\&M University}{}{
    \begin{itemize}
        \item Discovered formula determining the total number of different transposition decompositions of a permutation cycle.
        \item Developed a program to compute the entries and eigensystem of the integer partition matrix.
    \end{itemize}
}
\cventry{Summer 2015}{Undergraduate Research Assistant}{Department of Mathematics}{Texas A\&M University}{}{
    \begin{itemize}
        \item Analyzed sound quality of vinyls from before and after RIAA standardization to improve sound quality in old recordings.
    \end{itemize}
}

\section{Work Experience}

\cventry{2016 - Present}{Peer Teacher}{Department of Computer Science}{Texas A\&M University}{}{
    \begin{itemize}
        \item Support six professors in their course load by mentoring and tutoring hundreds of students in computer science.
        \item Assist students one-on-one with debugging and analyzing their C++ programs in office hours.
        \item Selected to lead weekly review lessons on discrete mathematics.
    \end{itemize}
}
\cventry{2015 - Present}{Student Assistant}{Department of Mathematics}{Texas A\&M University}{}
{
    \begin{itemize}
        \item Graded homework and exams for multivariate calculus class of over 90 students.
    \end{itemize}
}
\cventry{Summer 2016}{SMaRT Camp Counselor}{Department of Mathematics}{Texas A\&M University}{}{
    \begin{itemize}
        \item Served as a counselor at a two-week math camp for twenty gifted high school students from around the country.
        \item Taught students how to make formal proofs and introduced them to advanced mathematics topics.
    \end{itemize}
}
